long_description: These REI Venus 70 shoulder straps replace worn or damaged shoulder straps on the women's REI Venus 70 pack. With a rip-and-stick torso adjustment, shoulder strap system easily slides along pack's frame to fit torsos of varying lengths. Precurved, padded shoulder straps match your anatomy for nonbinding comfort on and off the trail.
short_description: These REI Venus 70 shoulder straps replace worn or damaged shoulder straps on the women's REI Venus 70 pack.
